titleStmt.title: SII 4.345: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 345. (A.R. No. 22 of 1890). SOUTH WALL OF THE ANEKATANGAPADAM TEMPLE AT CONJEEVERAM, CONJEEVERAM TALUK, CHINGLEPUT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara Urimaiyiṟ ciṟanta maṇimuṭi cūṭi miṉavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara Eṉai manṉavar Iriyaluṟṟiḻitarat tikkaṉaittuntan cak
karaṉaṭātti vijayaabhiṣekam paṇṇi virasiṁhāsanattup puvaṉamuḻutumuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya śrī kulottuṅkacoḻadevarkku yāṇṭu muppattunālāvatu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷa jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭa
lattu Eyiṟkoṭṭattu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattu Āḷuṭaiyār tiruvaṉekataṅkāpatamuṭaiya mahādevarkku nittanimantañ celuttukaikku Antarāyamuṭpaṭa Iṟaiyili tevatāṉamiṭṭa nirnilam kāñcipurattut tūṇinilattut tirukkaṟṟaḷimahā- devarkoyilu
kku vaṭakkum putterikkuk kiḻakkum rājentiracoḻantirumatuḷukku meṟkum kiḻputterikkut teṟkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa vaṭatāḻampaḷḷattuṭaippuṭpaṭat teṟkaṭaiya Iṭṭa nilam Iruveliyum kalluveṭṭikkoḷkavenṟu tiruvāymoḻinta
ruḷap pallavataraiyar kalveṭṭuvittapaṭi ..
Digital edition of SII 4.345 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
